title: Kerwan
typeOfFood: Lacto, Mediterranean, Middle Eastern, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lebanese family-run restaurant in the city centre. Menu is in German. Vegan suitable include the lentil soup, mixed salad, fatoush, tabbouleh, hummus, mutable, foul, coriander potatoes, eggplant, vine leaves, plus 3 main dishes which are the falafel plate, vegetable plate, and vegetarian moussaka). For salads as a separate or side dish, ask for the balsamic vinegar dressing.
